0601.name: ECU internal fault
0601.description: EEPROM failure  ( incorrect reading of the fault codes )

5202.name: Electropump assembly critical temperature reached fault
5202.description: Overheating of the electric pump unit

5203.name: Jamming of the electropump assembly motor fault

5204.name: Steering wheel angle sensor signal S1 fault
5204.description: Short circuit to positive or to earth

5205.name: Steering wheel angle sensor signal S2 fault
5205.description: Short circuit to positive or to earth

5206.name: Fault between signal S1 and S2 from the steering wheel angle sensor

5208.name: Vehicle speed information fault
5208.description: Short circuit to positive or open circuit

5209.name: Ignition positive supply fault
5209.description: Ignition positive disconnected when the vehicle is running

5211.name: Attempt to restart the assistance at high vehicle speed
5211.description: Assistance does not start at a significant vehicle speed

5406.name: Fault overheating of the electropump assembly

540B.name: Under-voltage in stop and start mode

D000.name: Fault: ECU not communicating on the CAN
D000.description: No transmission of the power steering status dataframe

D003.name: Communication fault on the CAN network

D105.name: Speed of rotation of the steering wheel information fault
D105.description: Speed of rotation of the steering wheel information absent or lost

D108.name: Fault absence of communication with the engine management ECU and the hybrid management ECU (If the hybrid management ECU is present)
D108.description: Internal combustion engine status information missing

D205.name: Speed of rotation of the steering wheel information fault

D208.name: Fault absence of communication with the engine management ECU and the hybrid management ECU (If the hybrid management ECU is present)

D213.name: Communication fault with the ESP ECU

D305.name: Speed of rotation of the steering wheel information fault

D308.name: Fault absence of communication with the engine management ECU and the hybrid management ECU (If the hybrid management ECU is present)

D313.name: Vehicle speed information received from the ABS/ESP fault
D313.description: Functional faults due to the ABS/ESP
